title: What are some popular festivals or events in your country?

korean: 한국에는 정말 다양한 축제와 행사들이 많아.
가장 큰 명절은 설날이랑 추석인데, 가족들이 다 모여.
설날엔 떡국 먹고 세배하는 전통이 있어.
추석엔 송편 만들어 먹고 차례 지내지.
봄에는 여러 지역에서 벚꽃 축제가 열려.
여의도나 진해 같은 곳이 특히 유명해.
여름엔 해변에서 여름 축제나 불꽃놀이 행사가 많아.
가을엔 단풍 축제랑 문화 축제들이 많이 열려.
겨울엔 빛 축제나 눈 축제 같은 게 인기 있어.
지역마다 특색 있는 축제들도 많이 생기고 있어.
전통 축제부터 현대적인 이벤트까지 다양해서 즐길 게 많아.
english: There are really, like, many various festivals and events in Korea.
The biggest holidays are Lunar New Year and Chuseok, and families all gather.
On Lunar New Year, there's a tradition of eating tteokguk and bowing to elders.
On Chuseok, we make and eat songpyeon and perform ancestral rites.
In spring, cherry blossom festivals are held in various regions.
Places like Yeouido and Jinhae are especially famous.
In summer, there are many summer festivals and fireworks events at beaches.
In fall, many autumn foliage festivals and cultural festivals are held.
In winter, light festivals and snow festivals are popular.
These days, music festivals have also, like, increased a lot.
Each region is creating many distinctive festivals too.
From traditional festivals to modern events, there's a variety, so there's a lot to enjoy.
